About Me

I am a systems engineering student with a deep passion for everything related to technology and computing.

Outside of academia, I am a curious person who loves to learn constantly. My interests include keeping up with tech news, learning new things related to computing, watching series, anime, action movies, and playing video games. These activities help me maintain creativity and inspiration for my projects.

I believe that computing is not just a profession, but also a way to connect ideas, people, and opportunities. My goal is to add value to every project I work on, using my technical skills and creativity.
